titleStmt.title: A proposal, humbly offer'd to the consideration of the honourable the Commons of England in Parliament assembled, for raising a farther supply towards the erecting and maintenance of the intended college or hospital at Greenwich, for ancient and maimed mariners and seamen; or such other good and publick use, as the honourable House shall think fit.
titleStmt.author: P. C.
D. C. aut

notesStmt.note: Imprint suggested by the British Library.
Signed at end: P.C. and D.C.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
